text:
While I normally agree with @brittlestar, I cannot endorse his message that #Pepsi is a suitable alternative to #Coke (or my favourite, #DietCoke)

He’s just plain WRONG

But on the topic of #CovidVaccine I agree 

The best #Vaccine is the one in your arm

#GetTheShot

#COVID19 https://t.co/jyeXk74p4g
